sentences.en: Although the calculation method of the average value is simple but its meaning is recondite.
sentences.cn: 平均值的计算方法虽然十分简单,但是,它的内涵却并不是十分简单.

sentences.en: Her poems are modishly experi-mental in style and recondite in subject-matter.
sentences.cn: 她的诗在风格上是时髦的实验派，主题艰深难懂。

sentences.en: Her poems are modishly experimental in style and recondite in subject matter.
sentences.cn: 她的诗在风格上时尚朦胧，在主题上深奥难懂。

sentences.en: Her poems are modishly experimental in style and recondite in subject-matter.
sentences.cn: 她的诗在风格上是时髦的实验派，主题艰深难懂。

words.tran_cn: 深奥的；隐藏的；默默无闻的

trans.tran_en: recondite facts or subjects are not known about or understood by many people
